name: Artillery Turret
description: Fires on enemies, shoots over obstacles

name: Cannon Turret
description: Stationary cannon fires on enemies

name: Machine Gun Turret
description: Rapid fire turret

name: Air Strike
description: Powerful series of explosions in a line

name: Cloak Drone
description: Cloaks you from enemies

name: Decoy
description: Fake tank version to distract enemies

name: Disguise Drone
description: Temporarily disguises you as enemy player

name: Grapnel Launcher
description: Prevents enemy firing/abilities, pulls them toward you

name: Grenade
description: Explosive surprise, detonates after delay

name: Reactive Plating
description: Absorbs incoming damage, explodes dealing proportional damage

name: Relay Drone
description: Short ranged teleport to chosen point

name: Repair Drone
description: Follows tank, repairs in short intervals

name: Repair Zone
description: Generator repairs allies around it over time

name: Repulsor Zone
description: Pushes enemies away from center

name: Shield Drone
description: Temporary shield blocks incoming damage

name: Shield Projector
description: Temporary shield barrier blocks enemies and projectiles

name: Smoke Canister
description: Covers area in smoke for hiding

name: Speed Booster
description: Temporary speed boost

name: Stun Grenade
description: Explosive stun, immobilizes enemies for seconds

name: Vortex Zone
description: Pulls enemies toward center
